rules.title: Become a Spell Genius!
rules.description: Put your spelling prowess to the test and become a true Spell Genius! Challenge your friends and see who can master the art of vocabulary.
rules.message1: Click 'Start Spell Genius' to begin your journey.
rules.message2: Click 'Hear the Word' to listen to the pronunciation of the hidden word and get a clue.
rules.message3: Spell the Word: Type one letter at a time to guess the word. You have 5 chances!
rules.message4: Decipher the Hints: The letters will light up in different colors to tell you what's right and wrong:
rules.message5: - Green: The letter is in the correct position.
rules.message6: - Red: The letter is in the wrong position or incorrect.
rules.message7: Once you've filled in the entire word, click 'Check Spelling' to see if you are a Spell Genius.

gameOver.title: Oh! Nooo!
gameOver.message: Hope you do better next time~

rules.title: How to solve Phrase Puzzle?
rules.description: Come play with your friends! Test your English skills. It's fun and can also improve your English abilities, so why not give it a try?
rules.message1: Enter a guess: You have six chances to guess the word. Enter one complete English word at a time.
rules.message2: Get a hint: After each entry, the system will highlight each letter in different colors to indicate its status:
rules.message3: Green: The letter is in the correct position.
rules.message4: Yellow: The letter is in the word, but in the wrong position.
rules.message5: Gray: The letter is not in the word.
rules.message6: Correct your answer: Based on the hints provided by the system, you can correct your next guess.
rules.message7: Guess the word correctly: If you guess the correct word within six chances, you win.
